​ AllergyIntolerance
​ clinicalStatus S0..1Binding: AllergyIntoleranceClinicalStatusCodes (required)
​ verificationStatus S0..1Binding: AllergyIntoleranceVerificationStatusCodes (required)
​ code S1..1Binding: US Core Common substances for allergy and intolerance documentation including refutations (extensible)
